content.label: Soundtrack is beautiful
This is one of the more beautiful games I have ever seen. The amount of detail in this game is astonishing.

Not much of a game (no challenge)
The entire story is told in the description of the game.
The price is very high for a short and unchallenging game.
The graphics are good, which raises it it 2 stars from 1 star.

I was disappointed – then again, I’ve been spoiled by Monument Valley. The illustrations in this game are nice but the rest of it doesn’t deliver. The game play is not well designed. While the basic action of moving the landscape in order to move through it is nice, but the rest of the actions you can take in the “world” of this game are somewhat random. That makes the effort to reward ratio too high, esp since the motivation and aims are unclear. Worst of all, the music is dopey
Very suitable for family play together!

This game is cute, and the way you move the old man around is clever - but it gets old fast.  The game is great if you're just looking for something you don't have to think too much about.  If you like puzzles that are even slightly challenging, this is not the game for you.  In my opinion this game is over priced and underwhelming.

title.label: يلعن امممممم لعبة ولله اسطورييييييييييية ورب كعبة

content.label: The graphics are amazing BUT its not a puzzle game! Its so boring!! I paid around 4 dollars for movie some landscapes to let the old man move around? This is not expectable
Such a thoughtful and poignant game. Simple and lovely aesthetics, beautiful music, and unique gameplay tell a story of love, hubris, selfishness, loss, and redemption. A truly amazing experience!
Beautiful, charming, emotional

The sensitivity, artistry and emotion of this game is surprising and delightful. As the story unfolds, it’s easy to forget is a puzzle. The puzzle itself is not terribly challenging, but it is very engaging, very calming, very beautiful.

This kept coming up in my recommendations and some of the reviews are glowing. It’s an editor’s choice; but it’s boring. It is NOT a puzzle game, occasionally you have to move the path, but that becomes a total snooze. 

The graphics are beautiful and the story is ok. I wish I didn’t pay full price, because I keep feeling like I’m missing something.
I wish it had employed more varied gameplay and story-driving elements. the imagery was beautiful.

title.label: Good game but kind of a waste of money

content.label: I really liked the game but it seems like  the price is kind of high

Takes about 30 minutes to complete, soothing and good graphics and music. Story line is predictable but still satisfying but not worth $4.99 for one time play, after you complete the journey just like the old man it’s over. Would be better at .99 cents.

title.label: Awesome game but a tad short

content.label: It’s such a relaxing game and it’s art is amazing and it’s story is sad but with meaning I would buy it again but it was just a tad short like I was expecting it to be a little longer

If you’re stuck....like I am....there is no way to continue the game.  No rules, hints, or instructions of any kind.
A total waste of $4.99

Hello! I love the game but I came across a bit of a bug in the game, the bug didn’t let the old man move even when I pressed my screen in possible areas the old man should’ve been able to move to and I could also move the same hill old man was on and the level it happened in was at the level when the old man gets out of the balloon.. so I closed and reopened the app and old man was moving again but it really bothered me since it took awhile to get pass some of the waterfalls.

But either way I still enjoy the game!
Subject sums it up.

If you like walking simulators then you’ll probably enjoy this, but if you’re looking for actual puzzles then avoid this. Slow pace, predictable story line.  Does clicking here do something or does it change where the character is walking to?  Move some lines, make the character plod somewhere is the extent of the puzzles. Great artwork, tho.
This is really a beautiful game and great buy. Lovely story and reminds me of the love I have for my family.
All he do is just walking around most boring game ever 👎🏻

Slowest game ever! No puzzles to solve! False advertisement for sure! Not even sure how this made the top game list and to charge 5 bucks for it! Sheesh. Wont be buying any other games, any time soon!
Not your usual game. Slow.  Beautiful.  Geared for an older crowd. Loved it.

At first I was hesitant to try this out as the gameplay didn’t really seem to be my cup of tea. What I found upon completing this game, was not just a game at all: this was an experience. It resonates so well emotionally and digs at your core. It tells a compelling story without dialogue and just the most relaxing, mood-setting music. You may find yourself a little teary-eyed as I did by the end. A masterful work of art.
All you do is try to walk through a landscape. That’s it. This is sold as a game - and it is not. Want my money back.

Interesting game mechanics and puzzles. 
Superb artwork and animation - it's not easy to tell a story without words.

I’m struggling to figure out how to get the paid version. Sounds simple, but it’s not. Yikes!

I got it! Now I’m on my way to the boat. I like this game. I’m an older woman with wonderful memories.

Gorgeously rendered, but stopped playing when I couldn’t figure out how to move sheep out of the way. I can walk though a group of 4 sheep, and have. I have no idea how the game developers thought this would be an entertaining (remember, your job is to entertain) puzzle.
Lovely, psychologically satisfying story unfolds in this gentle game where the puzzles are mildly challenging, but the rewards for solving them are aesthetically pleasing. I loved it.

Very unlike games like candy crush or other obnoxious noisy games. The animation is like watercolor and very gorgeous. The soundtrack is also very calming and the gameplay is like logic. There were also times during the gameplay where I felt like crying because it was so beautifully told.  A very mature and beautiful game. Looking for more from the developer.
אני מאוד נהנתי מהמישחק וגם הוא מלמד סבלנות
Awesome game
This game is different than most. The style of art is incredible, and to be able to interact with most of the artwork is great.

This is a beautiful, heart string pulling Indie game. It is full of beautiful graphics and content which has been given much thought. The developer has created a interactive design and a man whose life appeared to start, as all of ours do yet, as real life goes we never get to choose how things work out. 
My best advice is that you must be a person who has patience, depth in your heart and the ability to empathize when playing this game.
I enjoyed this game. Good story art music and puzzles.

title.label: An old man on an old mans journey

content.label: This was not only moving, but cathartic for me.  Thank you for a wonderful game
A game with a message, so refreshing. I’d like more please.
The Old Man Journey is I a lot like all of ours.  Build on good memories, regrets and redemption.  But, also a never-ending love for those people 👫 that were a part of our life.
Come to my mind memory’s from my daddy and his awesome work... from heaven to my dad.
not fun and short this is this oh scrw you！游戏开发商。！

I just fished this game and was seriously disappointed. I bought the game because the graphics were amazing however once I started playing it I found myself very bored. There's no real point to the game. You just take a walk. When I finished it I was very surprised that it was over, you could beat this in an hour tops if you wanted to. I recommend not purchasing this.

Last week, I gave this two stars because the game was stuck on the splash animation on my iPad Pro (I was still able to play on iPhone). Within a few days I heard from Felix who shortly after sent me an updated version via TestFlight, and it works perfectly. Great customer support!
It looks like a great relaxing game. It’s not it’s incredibly boring. All you get to do it move the land. Nothing fun. Completely a waste of money.

title.label: Great game, wish it was longer

content.label: It’s a great game. Kept me busy and active, just wish there was more after the story to continue playing,  maybe harder missions.
This game is more like going to a sweet and sad movie than your typical puzzle game, but it’s a pleasure to play and experience.
Short and compelling story that doesnt need words to explain.
Pretty graphics, but terrible game. A rip-off @ $4.99.
30 minutes start to finish. Move hills to keep walking. Waste of money.

title.label: Great game to slow down with

content.label: In this fast paced world of hyper video games filled with violence and/or silly themes, this game was a pleasure to play.  The pace was an unexpected surprise and welcomed.  I enjoyed the hand drawn art which just made the game all the more pleasurable, know that so much care and heart went into the creation of it.  I recommend it if you’re looking for a break from the norm.
